title: Recovery from an eating disorder in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2015 , by disorder
summary: United Kingdom reported 20 aircraft Chronically_ill in 2015 , meanwhile UK delivered 23 aircraft that year .
The two manufacturers form a de-facto duopoly in the market for large jet airliners .
With only 23 Chronically_ill , UK experienced its worst year in more than a decade .
gold: This statistic displays the recovery rate of individuals suffering from an eating disorder in the United Kingdom in 2015.
Approximately 46 percent of sufferers of anorexia nervosa and 45 percent of sufferers of bulimia nervosa make a full recovery .
